title: Fix SKPaint.Clone
body:
Clone should operate on SkCompatPaint

**Description of Change**

Fix crash on dispose of a cloned SKPaint

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #2899

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.
